name: SUPER FLOOR DEGREASER™
description: SUPER FLOOR DEGREASER™ Deep Cleaning floor cleaner/degreaser is designed to keep the greasiest floors clean and odor free. The unique FORMULATION of fat and grease eating microbes and enzymes in this product naturally eliminates organic materials and grease that cause the slippery condition on your floors - they eat right down into the grout and pores of the floor tiles. This product is excellent for cleaning the busiest industrial kitchen areas and high traffic food plant floor areas where grease and oils build up.
